Name: Farmer Pug Dash
About the game: Your animals have all gone missing and it's your job to get them back! Find your animals in adventure mode and collect coins to decorate your farm! Collect them all! Farmer Pug Dash is a runner game with a farm that you can decorate with coins earned in Adventure Mode. In Adventure mode you will also find and collect 9 different animals for your farm, including 2 ultra rare unlisted animals that only the most dedicated runners will achieve! Fill your farm with animals and decorations and become the ultimate Farmer Pug! Features Pugs Infinite procedurally generated adventure mode Spend coins found in adventure mode to purchase decorations for your farm Find 9 different animals for your farm including 2 super secret hidden ones Pugs Endless fun 25 Pugnacious achievements to pad your steam account with pugs and more
